ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped in a past that isn't her own, Miss Fury comes face-to-face with a version of herself who never found love, and it's a bloody, murderous revelation. Is this immoral figure who Marla Drake really is? Or has she grown through time into something better? And when the two Miss Furys cross swords, which one will survive?
*List of covers and their creators:* Column Head | Column Head | Column Head | Column Head | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Billy Tan | 1 | B | Cover B | Adrian Syaf | 2 | C | Cover C | Colton Worley | 3 | D | Cover D | Sean Chen | 4 | Risque | Risque Cover | Alé Garza | 5 | RI | Retailer Incentive Black & White Cover | Unlisted | 6 | RI | Retailer Incentive Black & White Cover | Sean Chen | 7 | RI | Retailer Incentive Black & White Cover | Alé Garza | 8 | RI | Retailer Incentive Black & White Cover | Billy Tan | 9 |
